title: Immune mechanisms and predictive biomarkers related to neoadjuvant immunotherapy response in stage III melanoma
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Amanda Braga Figueiredo, Milton José Barros e Silva, Guilherme Ferreira de Britto Evangelista, Nayane Alves de Lima Galdino, Larissa de Melo Kuil, Iasmim Polido Santos, Kátia Luciano Pereira Morais, Clara Maciel Cavalcanti, Luciana Facure Moredo, João Pedreira Duprat-Neto, Kenneth J Gollob
